allow: Bash(powershell -Command "Get-ChildItem -Path ''C:\projects\Endpoint'' -Filter ''*.cs'' -Recurse -File | Where-Object { $_FullName -notmatch ''\obj\'' -and $_FullName -notmatch ''\bin\'' } | ForEach-Object { $content = Get-Content $_FullName -TotalCount 2 -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; if ($content.Count -lt 2 -or $content[0] -ne ''// Copyright (c) Quinntyne Brown. All Rights Reserved.'' -or $content[1] -ne ''// Licensed under the MIT License. See License.txt in the project root for license information.'') { $_FullName } }")
